TopicTitle: How do I know if I have been updated?

Articles.Content: This is probably a dumb question, but how do I know I have received the patch?  I have Steam set to automatically update, but I have seen no changelog alert when loading the game or any other indication.

Main menu shows the game version. It would say 0.1.1.something

You can also try to verify game files in properties if you're still not sure, that's how I actually updated.
